abstract: The Federal Trade Commission announced a settlement with Fitness Brands Inc. and its marketing partners on Thursday, over deceptive advertising claims for an abdominal exercise machine called the Ab Circle Pro.
snippet: The Federal Trade Commission announced a settlement with Fitness Brands Inc. and its marketing partners on Thursday, over deceptive advertising claims for an abdominal exercise machine called the Ab Circle Pro.
lead_paragraph: There are few easy ways to lose weight quickly, but that has not stopped some marketers from making claims to the contrary, especially for products pitched on late-night infomercials.

headline.main: F.T.C. Settles With Marketers of Ab Circle Pro
